name: Florida Aviation Career Training, Inc.
about: Florida Aviation Career Training, Inc. (FACT) has been in continuous operation since 1990, tracing its background to the St. Augustine flight school operated by Mr. Jim Moser. Owned and managed by Mr. Bjorn Ottesen since October 1993, FACT achieved Part 141 FAA certification in 1991 and remains FAR 141 compliant. Located at the St. Augustine Airport, FACT offers a range of programs including Private, Commercial, Instrument, and Flight Instructor certifications under both Part 61 and Part 141. With instructors having over 210 years of combined flying experience, FACT maintains a high pass rate exceeding 90% and provides one-on-one training, advanced technology, and strict safety standards. The school also accommodates international students and offers accommodations and visa assistance. FACT is committed to providing excellent instruction and preparing students for successful careers in aviation.
